original_text: But now you are going across the Jordan River into a different kind of land. It has hills and valleys. Rain falls from the sky and makes the ground wet.
korean_text: 너희가 건너가서 차지할 땅은 산과 골짜기가 있어서 하늘에서 내리는 비를 흡수하는 땅이요

sentences.original_text: But now you are going across the Jordan River
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이제 당신들은 요단 강을 건너고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: into a different kind of land
